'''quenta''' is a [[Quenya]] word translated as "account, narrative, story".<ref>{{VT|39a3}}, p. 16</ref>
==Etymology==
The word derives from the [[PQ]] noun *''[[kwentâ]]'' < [[root]] [[KWET]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}</ref>
==Examples==
*[[quentale]]
*[[quentaro]]
*[[quentasta]]
*[[lúmequenta]]
*[[Valaquenta]]
*[[Quenta Silmarillion]]
*[[Quenta Noldorinwa]]
===Note===
''Quenta'' is also the past participle of the verb ''[[quet-]]'' "speak", meaning "said". It is seen in several compounds.
*''[[alaquenta]]'' "well (happily) said"<ref name="PE">{{PE|17}}</ref>
*''[[hanquenta]]'' "answer"<ref name="PE"/>
*''[[manaquenta]]'' "blessed"<ref>{{VT|44a}}, pp. 5, 10-11</ref>

==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[pent]], [[pennas]]''
==Inspiration==
In Spanish ''cuento'' means "story".
